column4: Gaim and AOL had an agreement of some kind a while back too that was supposed to settle this, but AOL somehow squeezed around it
I use GAIM; how do I send a file to you? Not that I want to, I just want to know how :-)
In IM window, the menu Conversation -> Send File
you have to actually open an IM with someone to transfer a file

Well, I have a menu item "Conversation", another "Options" and a greyed out one "Send to". Under "Conversations" there is no "Send file". I'm not sure it's the "IM window" though, it's the window this conversation is appearing in...
OK, how do I start an IM with someone in GAIM?
in the conversation window is what I meant
Ah - if I right-click their name in the names list on the right, I get a mini-menu, and send file is on it.
you must be using a different version of Gaim - I don't get that. :P
IN help about I get "GAIM 2.0.0beta6", it came as part of Feisty.

In my "main window" I see this conversation. To the right is a narrow vertical pane containing the nicks of all those on this channel at the moment. If I right click on a name in that list, I get "IM", "Send file", "Ignore", "Info", "Add" and "Last Said" as options. I'm about to try sending you a (harmless, text) file as an experiment.
you are using Gaim in IRC. I get it now
i mean, swap that - using IRC in Gaim
